data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Homa Bay, Kenya by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Homa Bay, Kenya
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Homa Bay who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary: On average, 18 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Homa Bay, Kenya.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Please, teach the 478,085 believers in Homa Bay, Kenya how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Homa Bay, Kenya with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Gujarati people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 291,286 people in the state of Homa Bay who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Homa Bay, Kenya to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Homa Bay, Kenya.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

location.name: Homa Bay
location.people_groups_list: Midgan, Munyoyaya, Orma, Punjabi, Arab, Hadrami
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Midgan (2,600), Munyoyaya (2,100), Orma (85,000), Punjabi (67,000), Arab, Hadrami (13,000)
